item.description:
(1) Come share "shamelessly" what you HAVE deliberately manifested this year... or in the process of manifesting. We look forward to REJOICE & CELEBRATE with you.

(2) Please wear clothes that will allow you to sit comfortably on the floor. Be ready to move, dance, sing and simply have fun!

(3) Please come to share at least 1 thing that have helped you stay aligned and inspired in your journey of living a more fulfilled and joyous life in 2008.
(e.g. a poem, an affirmation, a song, guided meditation, book reference)

(4) Bring a favorite MAIN ENTREE to share. We will provide the desserts and refreshments. You're welcome to bring wine too (as an extra to share).

We are very thankful that we have deliberately attracted you folks into our lives this year.

much JOY!
ChewHoong & Dave

===========
Directions to Meetup & Parking info:

Open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup" at
http://lawofattractio...

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: CELEBRATE YOU!! Tues 12/9 BostonLOA Meetup, 7 - 9 pm
